snippet.title: Rogue Command - Gameplay Minitrailer September 2022
snippet.description:
Play our huge free demo on Steam now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1461910/Rogue_Command/
(some have already played it for dozens of hours!)

Rogue Command is a classic RTS with roguelike and deckbuilding elements. In a distant world of planets being devoured by a huge industrial machinery, you guide The Engineer on his journey to figure out a build so crazy and absurd that it will allow him to push back the threat and get back to chilling at his favorite pond.
Survive mean AI enemies, procedural maps and environmental hazards.
